event.title: was extended from Mayne Junction in 1899

data.event: As settlement continued northward along Kelvin Grove Road in the late 19th Century, livestock saleyards opened in the area bordered by Enoggera Road, Newmarket Road, Wilston Road and Alderson Street, and were serviced by Newmarket train station after the rail line was extended from Mayne Junction in 1899.

event.title: were moved to Cannon Hill in 1931

data.event: As urban development continued in Newmarket the saleyards were moved to Cannon Hill in 1931.
